column2: "Guh...!! Why do you insist on fighting this!?"
"She wishes for her own death! I know, because I ended her life with these hands a decade ago!"
"But YOU... me... are still saying to not give up on her!?"
"1. I will never give up!"
"2. I will save her!"
"Tch-! You can see the end in sight and you still spew that nonsense!!"
"Hoping to save her, one fool fruitlessly stumbled through time... failing again and again."
"...that fool is me! That fool is you!!"
"My wishes amounted to nothing! I don't have the power to save her! I only have the power to kill her!"
"...Who am I kidding. I can read my own mind."
"I, too, refused to give up... which is why I waited until now, the very last moment."
"Knowing full well that I could never succeed, I continued holding out... how foolish I've been."
"1. What if we combined forces?"
"Combined... forces...? Save her together? What kind of stupid..."
"...idea... was that. I remember... that idea. How nostalgic."
"No matter what happens, no matter the cost, you're willing to save her?"
"...Very well. Let us see how far this goes, fighting until the bitter end. ...True to myself..."
"<%me>, you've filled me with determination."
"...Let's bring her home."

"
You've obtained the Matterboard 『What Lies Beyond that Day』.
"
